summary: This mod simply contains vanilla ebony meshes and textures from RaizuX's mod More ebony recolors mod to make his original assets into standalone pieces. All assets used in the mod are used with permission from RaizuX, see nexusmods 78554 for the original mod
descriptionHtml:
This mod contains all the textures from RaizuX's more ebony recolors mod here on the nexus, and vanilla ebony meshes (male and female).
This mod aims to make all the colors from the original mod into individual standalone pieces, weapons and armor. The mod contains meshes and textures for each of the colors from the original mod, simply install the color you like into your skyrim data folder and enjoy the new weapons/armor in your game.  Since this mod only contains meshes and textures you will need to use the creation kit to make them standalone in your own mods.
If you wish for me to setup the meshes in the creation kit for you simply message me and i will update this mod for you.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78554]More Ebony Recolors by Raizux[/url]

Installation:
install the meshes and textures either manually or via NMM into your skyrim\data folder.

Uninstallation:
Remove the newly created meshes and texture folders from your skyrim directory.  

Credits:
RaizuX :- For permisson to use his assets in this mod
Nifscope :- for applying the new colors into the meshes
author: hooperdragon
